synopsis.p: Write elements in a tab separated file.

description.p: evaluates as a list of elements and writes them in . Each result element is written on a distinct line. For each element, evaluates each element of and writes the result in a spearate column.

param-doc.name: outFile
param-doc.p: File where the result is written.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: target
param-doc.p: Elements that should be printed on each line.

param-doc.name: fields
param-doc.p: Values of each column. Each expression is evaluated from the target element.

param-doc.name: headers
param-doc.p: Names of each column, written on the first line. If this parameter is not set does not print a header line.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
